pl.polsl.lab1.pawel.salicki.controller

Class MainController

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.polsl.lab1.pawel.salicki.controller.MainController

  • public class MainController
extends java.lang.Object
    Main controller of program. his class mediates communication between the user interface and the operation of the application.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pawe≈Ç Salicki

    • Method Detail

      • addPlayers

        private java.util.ArrayList<Player> addPlayers(java.lang.String teamVersion,
                                               int matchLength)
        The method is used to obtain information about subsequent players of the team. It calls the appropriate user interface methods telling you what to type at the moment.
        Parameters:
        teamVersion - string of characters informing about the type of team about which the user provides information (Host / Guest)
        matchLength - length of the match needed for questions about how long players play on the field
        Returns:
        the method returns a list of players about which information was obtained

      • getArbiterName

        private java.lang.String getArbiterName()
        The method prompts the user for the match referee's name and retrieved information.
        Returns:
        match referee name

      • getArbitratorAssistants

        private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getArbitratorAssistants()
        The method calls the user interface methods to get information about the names of the match referee's assistants.
        Returns:
        list of match referee's midfielder names

      • getMatchLength

        private int getMatchLength()
        The method calls the method from the user interface class to get information about the length of the match.
        Returns:
        matchLength length of the match in minutes

      • getTeamName

        private java.lang.String getTeamName(java.lang.String teamVersion)
        The method calls the method from the user interface to get information about the name of the team.
        Parameters:
        teamVersion - name of the team
        Returns:
        user imput entry (team name)

      • getNameCoach

        private java.lang.String getNameCoach(java.lang.String teamName)
        The method calls the method from the user interface to get information about the coach name.

        Returns:
        user imput entry (coach name)

        private java.lang.String getFilePath()
        A method that calls the user interface for a file path.
        Returns:

      • addNewMatch

        private void addNewMatch()
                  throws java.lang.NumberFormatException
        The method invokes queries from the user interface forcing it to fill information with relevant data. In addition, the method creates a new match for the database.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException

      • searchMatchByID

        private boolean searchMatchByID()
        A method that calls the method from the user interface to get information about the match id.
        Returns:
        user input (match id)

      • stopConsole

        private void stopConsole()
        The method calls the method from the user interface with information about pressing Enter to continue the application. Waiting for input from the user.

      • openDataFile

        public void openDataFile(java.lang.String filePath)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        The method passes the file path to the database to open and read it.
        Parameters:
        filePath - path to the text file with the database
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - exception about bad file reading

      • startProgram

        public void startProgram()
                  throws java.io.IOException
        The method that calls the program. It is also the main loop of the program.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
